definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: Instead of gold, all that was needed to produce more banknotes was paper, ink, and a printing press.
sentences.chinese: 和黃金不同，生產紙幣只需要紙墨和一臺印刷機。

sentences.english: This new rotary press prints very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型輪轉印刷機印刷得很快。

sentences.english: Certain waves can be used in rapid drying devices that installed in web printing presses.
sentences.chinese: 某些波段可用於捲筒紙印刷機上的快速乾燥裝置。

sentences.english: This printing machine has a carriage which holds and moves the paper.
sentences.chinese: 這臺印刷機上的滑動板可放紙和移動紙張。

sentences.english: The old printing press will have to be pensioned off.
sentences.chinese: 那個舊印刷機得報銷了。

sentences.english: Who have mastered the production of pyridine technology, will have the equivalent of a printing press.
sentences.chinese: 誰掌握了吡啶生產技術，將具有相當於一臺印刷機。

sentences.english: This is done on fast-moving printing machines.
sentences.chinese: 印報工作是在快速運轉的印刷機上進行的。

sentences.english: Remember,there's no printing press in the ancient world.
sentences.chinese: 要記得古代是沒有印刷機的。

sentences.english: New four-colour printing press outside of Heidelberg, CTP technology.
sentences.chinese: 全新對開海德堡四色印刷機，CTP技術。

sentences.english: The Company is now added a new six-color rotary press and screen printing machine.
sentences.chinese: 本公司現又增加了全新六色輪轉印刷機及絲網印刷機。

sentences.english: The Company is now added a new six-color rotary press and screen printing machine.
sentences.chinese: 本公司現又增加了全新六色輪轉印刷機及絲網印刷機。

sentences.english: The company is a supplier of offset and rotogravure printing machines.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是一家膠印和凹版印刷機的供應商。

sentences.english: The newspaper is the most novel product of the printing press.
sentences.chinese: 報紙是印刷機制造的最新奇的產品。

sentences.english: This is done on fastmoving printing machines.
sentences.chinese: 印報工作是在快速印刷機上完成的。

sentences.english: The air conditioner was just what the Brooklyn printer needed.
sentences.chinese: 這種空調設備正好是布魯克林印刷機所需要的。

definition: Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
